App.title: User Manual
App.description: This project is responsible for managing and integrating the user manuals for the system.

400.title: Bad Request
400.message: Your request is invalid, please check and try again.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: Your session has expired or is invalid, please login again.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You do not have permission to perform this operation.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

409.title: Conflict
409.message: The resource already exists, please check and try again.

422.title: Validation Error
422.message: Data validation failed, please check your input.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: Too many failed attempts, please try again later.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: An error occurred on the server, please try again later.

unknown.title: Unexpected Error
unknown.message: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later.

network.title: Connection Error
network.message: Unable to connect to the server, please check your network connection.

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.message: The request took too long, please try again later.

incorrect.title: Incorrect Data
incorrect.message: The provided data is incorrect, please check and try again.

logout.title: Confirm Logout
logout.message: Are you sure you want to logout?
